data.why:
I want to contribute a module to convert numbers into polish words.
    e.g. 123.10 ==> sto dwadzieścia trzy zł dziesięć gr

    I had to write it for a customer, and was a little annoyed that it
    had not been on CPAN yet... there are however english (and some
    other) language modules available, so I found it usefull to
    contribute my work.

    I am writing a lot in perl, and plan to contribute more later.
